title: Simon Game
subtitle: Interactive Memory Game
description: A React-based implementation of the classic Simon memory game using component-driven UI and state management.

title: Weather App
subtitle: Real-Time Weather Forecast Application
description: A React-based weather application that fetches real-time weather data using external APIs.

title: Task Master
subtitle: Task Management Application
description: A React-based task management application with component-driven architecture and persistent state handling.

title: LifeOS
subtitle: Personal Digital Life Dashboard
description: A comprehensive full-stack productivity platform that unifies task management, habit tracking, mood journaling, and hydration reminders into one calm, beautiful interface with passwordless authentication.
features: Passwordless auth with Email OTP & Google Sign-In
Dynamic Wellness Score combining tasks, habits, hydration & mood
Interactive onboarding tutorial for new users

title: NoteMint
subtitle: AI-Powered MERN Notes App
description: A full-stack MERN application that allows users to create, organize, and summarize notes using AI.

title: Campus connect
subtitle: Centralized Campus Communication Platform
description: A centralized campus information system that automates notices, enables resource sharing, and offers a modern, accessible UI.
